summary: A much needed upgraded to Belethor`s
descriptionHtml:
Belethors General Goods is now improved with much more stock in his store, such as pelts, food, misc. items, cutlery, etc., i made them all static because i think i robbing small unnecessary items like that just ruins the look of any shop,

I get a glitch where i get 2 Belethor`s for some reason, if this happens to you then open the console command and target one and enter "markfordelete", it will disable the npc and will be no longer there

hope you a like my mod and please e :)

REQUIRED RESOURCES:

Edles Silberbesteck - Noble Silver Cutlery
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46454/?

FoodContainer Resource
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14133/?

Modders Resource Pack
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16525/?

author: Buddy1011
